bug.author: jonomon
bug.summary: R installation instructions out of date
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
(A clear and concise description of what the bug is.) In the installation instructions found <denchmark-link:https://mxnet.apache.org/get_started/ubuntu_setup.html#install-the-mxnet-package-for-r>https://mxnet.apache.org/get_started/ubuntu_setup.html#install-the-mxnet-package-for-r</denchmark-link> , files <denchmark-code>cd mxnet/docs/install ./install_mxnet_ubuntu_python.sh ./install_mxnet_ubuntu_r.sh </denchmark-code>
do not exist. <denchmark-h:h3>Error Message</denchmark-h>
(Paste the complete error message. Please also include stack trace by setting environment variable DMLC_LOG_STACK_TRACE_DEPTH=10 before running your script.) <denchmark-h:h2>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
(If you developed your own code, please provide a short script that reproduces the error. For existing examples, please provide link.) <denchmark-h:h3>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
(Paste the commands you ran that produced the error.)
<denchmark-h:h2>What have you tried to solve it?</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h2>Environment</denchmark-h>
We recommend using our script for collecting the diagnositc information. Run the following command and paste the outputs below: <denchmark-code>curl --retry 10 -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dmlc/gluon-nlp/master/tools/diagnose.py | python
# paste outputs here </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: Would you mind taking a look at <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/pull/17228>#17228</denchmark-link> ? It should fix your issue, but I'm not an R expert.
